name: NC Token
description:
NC Token is a multi-chain Real-World Asset (RWA) ecosystem that allows users to participate in real construction / real estate development projects using NFT Bonds.
Each NFT Bond represents a fractional participation record in a specific project and provides a fixed project yield (typically 15â€“20%) after project completion and repayment.
The platform is designed with strong investor protection and compliance-focused controls, including:
- Centralized admin control for operational security
- Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) enforced on-chain
- Strict project lifecycle state machine (non-reversible)
- Multi-signature treasury custody for funds
- Anti-dump sell limits to protect token price stability
- Emergency pause / circuit breaker for ecosystem safety
- Cross-chain supply integrity via Wormhole bridging
- NFT Bond burn-on-claim (deflationary bond model) to prevent double claims
